title: T206s for sale: graded Old Mill, Old Mill SL, EPDG, Tolstoi, Sovereign, Polar Bear
author: GoCalBears

posts.post_title: T206s for sale: graded Old Mill, Old Mill SL, EPDG, Tolstoi, Sovereign, Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
ALL UNSOLD CARD WERE PUT UP AT AUCTION ON EBAY JUST NOW. 

UPDATED LIST: 

Selling off a bunch of Higher Grade Graded Off-Backs (Hindu, Old Mill, Old Mill SL, EPDG, Tolstoi, Sovereign, Polar Bear). 

Please email me at [url]rjustincarter@hotmail.com[/url] for pictures. 

All the cards are SUPER CENTERED and, thus, I think most are present very well for the grades - a few even have the highly coveted (lol, sarcasm) PWCC extra stamp of approval. 

All prices are FIRM - although whatever doesn’t sell might be slightly negotiable in a week and/or so or go to eBay. 

Payments via PayPal and assume F/F. If you want to pay PP G&S, that’s fine, pls add 3% to prices below. 

I’ll cover priority mail shipping for total over $500, otherwise tack on $8 for shipping. Insured available for additional amount. 

Bradley, Bill (Batting): BVG 5: Polar Bear: $200
Conroy, Wid (With Bat): PSA 4: EPDG: SOLD
Donlan, Mike (With Bat): PSA 4: Polar Bear: $275
Lipe, Perry: SGC 4.5: Old Mill SL: $500
Mullaney, Dom: PSA 4: Old Mill SL: $680
Mullin, George (with bat): PSA 4: Tolstoi: $260
Rockenfeld, Ike: PSA 4: Old Mill SL: SOLD
Wilhelm, Kaiser (With Bat): PSA 4: Tolstoi: SOLD
Willett, Ed: PSA 4: Polar Bear: $250
